text:
="preserve">Image:Heather Whitestone 2008.png|thumb|Heather Leigh Whitestone 2008
Heather Leigh Whitestone (born February 24, 1973) is an American former beauty queen. She became Miss America 1995 on September 17, 1994. She was the first deaf Miss America. She lost most of her hearing about 18 months after birth.
